Scripts.OnTextChanged: if(strlen(self:GetText()) > 0) then PowaAuraExportDialogSendButton:Enable() else PowaAuraExportDialogSendButton:Disable() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if self:IsEnabled() then if self.aide then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) end end

PowaColor_SwatchBg:SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.aideColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

PowaGradientColor_SwatchBg:SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.aideSecondaryColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltipText, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnClick: if FontSelectorFrame:IsVisible() then PlaySound("TalentScreenClose", PowaMisc.SoundChannel) else PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel) end PowaAurasOptions:OpenFontSelector(self)

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnLoad: self.aide = PowaAurasOptions.Text.aideDuration self:SetMinMaxValues(0, 60) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(0.01) PowaBarAuraDurationSliderText:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.nomDuration) PowaBarAuraDurationSliderLow:SetText("0 sec") PowaBarAuraDurationSliderHigh:SetText("60 sec")

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetMinMaxValues(-700, 700) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(1) PowaTimerCoordXSliderText:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.nomPos.." X") PowaTimerCoordXSliderLow:SetText("-700") PowaTimerCoordXSliderHigh:SetText("700")

self:SetMinMaxValues(-400, 400) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(1) PowaTimerCoordYSliderText:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.nomPos.." Y") PowaTimerCoordYSliderLow:SetText("-400") PowaTimerCoordYSliderHigh:SetText("400")

self.aide = PowaAurasOptions.Text.aideTimerDuration self:SetMinMaxValues(0, 60) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(0.01) PowaTimerDurationSliderText:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.nomTimerDuration) PowaTimerDurationSliderLow:SetText("0 sec") PowaTimerDurationSliderHigh:SetText("60 sec")

Scripts.OnEnter: PowaTimerColor_SwatchBg:SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.aideTimerColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnLoad: self.aide = PowaAurasOptions.Text.aidePowaTimerInvertAuraSlider self:SetMinMaxValues(0, 600) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(0.01) PowaTimerInvertAuraSliderText:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.nomTimerInvertAura) PowaTimerInvertAuraSliderLow:SetText("0 sec") PowaTimerInvertAuraSliderHigh:SetText("600 sec")

self:SetMinMaxValues(-700, 700) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(1) PowaStacksCoordXSliderText:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.nomPos.." X") PowaStacksCoordXSliderLow:SetText("-700") PowaStacksCoordXSliderHigh:SetText("700")

self:SetMinMaxValues(-400, 400) self:SetValue(0) self:SetValueStep(1) PowaStacksCoordYSliderText:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.nomPos.." Y") PowaStacksCoordYSliderLow:SetText("-400") PowaStacksCoordYSliderHigh:SetText("400")

Scripts.OnEnter: PowaStacksColor_SwatchBg:SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(PowaAurasOptions.Text.aideStacksColor, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnClick: PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab4) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab5) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Hide() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)

PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab1) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab4) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab5) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Hide() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)

PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab1) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab4) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab5) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Hide() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)

PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab1) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab5) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Hide() PowaAurasOptions:UpdateTimerOptions() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)

PanelTemplates_SelectTab(self) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab1) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab2) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab3) PanelTemplates_DeselectTab(PowaEditorTab4) PowaBarConfigFrameEditor5:Show() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor1:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor2:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor4:Hide() PowaBarConfigFrameEditor3:Hide() PowaAurasOptions:UpdateStacksOptions() PlaySound("igCharacterInfoTab", PowaMisc.SoundChannel)
